physical_appearance:\The image depicts an electronic device for gaming and entertainment purposes
 as well as a gaming cartridge. There are two controllers with black buttons which are joined by wires. However
 they are not connected to the gaming console. There is a slot on the top of the gaming console that is the same length and width of the gaming cartridge. The gaming cartridge has the word
 \\Tennis\\
subject_terms_1:printed on it in capital letters. There is a speaker at the top of the electronic console electronic (technology-related concept) play (recreation) technology (general associated concept) brand name objects
subject_terms_2:as well as a speaker on one of the controllers. On the gaming console Nintendo video games Video games Amusements Technology Brand name products Toys
subject_terms_3:there is a \u0027Reset\u0027 and a \u0027Power\u0027 button which are maroon in colour
subject_terms_4:as well as an \u0027Eject\u0027 switch. \

metadata.title_text: Nintendo 1983 Family Computer (Famicom) game console and tennis game
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image depicts an electronic device for gaming and entertainment purposes, as well as a gaming cartridge. There are two controllers with black buttons which are joined by wires. However, they are not connected to the gaming console. There is a slot on the top of the gaming console that is the same length and width of the gaming cartridge. The gaming cartridge has the word, ""Tennis""
metadata.subject_terms_1: printed on it in capital letters. There is a speaker at the top of the electronic console electronic (technology-related concept) play (recreation) technology (general associated concept) brand name objects
metadata.subject_terms_2: as well as a speaker on one of the controllers. On the gaming console Nintendo video games Video games Amusements Technology Brand name products Toys
metadata.subject_terms_3: there is a 'Reset' and a 'Power' button which are maroon in colour
